Title: The Nazca Lines Enigma #shorts #short
Description: Fly over Peru's Nazca Lines and unravel their mystery. Who created them and why? Delve into this aerial enigma in a quick, enthralling video. #NazcaLines #PeruMystery #AncientCivilizations

Scenes.VoiceOverText: Imagine soaring above Peru and discovering vast, mysterious geoglyphs etched into the earth - welcome to the Nazca Lines.
Scenes.Description: Aerial views of the Nazca Lines, showing their immense scale and mysterious shapes.
